tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: List IPs
actions.description:
Lists IP addresses that are assigned to an instance.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Show IP details
actions.description:
Shows details for a specified IP address for a specified server instance.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud providers can change
 these permissions through the policy.json file.
